footer.text: SpeakPro is an independent AI-powered IELTS preparation tool. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Cambridge English, the British Council, or IDP Education. IELTS is a registered trademark of its respective owners. All content provided is for educational purposes only.

hero-section.title: SpeakPro – Your AI Coach for IELTS Speaking Success

propositions.content-1: Experience IELTS-style speaking tests in an AI-driven environment, just like the real exam.
propositions.content-2: Get AI-generated evaluations on fluency, coherence, vocabulary, and pronunciation.
propositions.content-3: Receive IELTS band predictions and detailed analysis of your performance.
propositions.content-4: Adaptive learning paths tailored to your strengths and weaknesses.
propositions.content-5: Access a vast collection of IELTS Part 1, Part 2, and Part 3 questions.
propositions.content-6: Monitor improvements with AI-driven insights and performance history.

questions.question-1: How does SpeakPro evaluate my speaking skills
questions.answer-1: SpeakPro uses AI to analyze your speech based on IELTS scoring criteria, providing detailed feedback on fluency, vocabulary, and coherence.
questions.question-2: Can I practice all three parts of the IELTS Speaking test?
questions.answer-2: Yes! SpeakPro includes Part 1 (interview), Part 2 (cue card task), and Part 3 (discussion), simulating the real test environment.
questions.question-3: Does SpeakPro provide a score prediction?
questions.answer-3: Yes, our AI model predicts your estimated IELTS Speaking band score based on your responses.
questions.question-4: Can I track my progress over time?
questions.answer-4: Absolutely! Your past performances, scores, and feedback are stored so you can track improvements and focus on weak areas.
questions.answer-5: Yes! Whether you're just starting or aiming for Band 8+, SpeakPro adapts to your skill level and provides targeted exercises.

form.personal-data: I give my consent to the processing of my personal data.

success-true.title: Thank you!
success-true.content: We have received your message and will get back to you shortly.

success-false.title: Oops, something went wrong...
success-false.content: We apologize for technical problems, try again later.
